item.title: Dumped rubbish bags, 25th December
item.description:
These rubbish bags were on the pavement - I saw the litter picker pick up rubbish which had spilled out and then kick the bag into the alleyway before waving at the lorry to come pick up the bags so they need collecting please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish bags, 25th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Street parking occupied by vehicle, trailer and potted plants, 25th December
item.description:
The street parking (and pavement) adjacent to St. Luke's Church in Dumbreck Road is permanently occupied by a Luton van, a hitched trailer, and a variety of potted plants. The street parking is frequently used by people attending services and community activities at St. Lukes, and this occupation is preventing the community from accessing these activities. Even if the vehicle is legitimately parked, the situation is an abuse of facilities provided for the general public in the area and should be prohibited.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dumbreck Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking blocking junction, 25th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Banyard Road, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping........as usual, 25th December
